𓅩

𒃡 ᵛur₃ "abundant"

𒁇 bar ⇔ ver (compound verb verbal element)

𒌑 ≈ 𒋰𒐈𒋰 •proto > pro ᵛúʳ verb

ver- German causative prefix ⇔ faire er- ⇔ zer-

𓁹 ⲓⲉⲣ ⋍ ⲓⲣⲓ ⇔ faire > re-… ⲉⲣ- er-… ver… ⲓⲣⲓ ⲛⲃⲉⲣⲓ = renew, erneuern, make new
𓁹 ⲓⲉⲣ ⋍ ⲓⲣⲓ > re-… ver- ⲉⲣ- er-… ⲓⲣⲓ ⲛⲃⲉⲣⲓ = renew, erneuern, make new

𓁹 ⲓⲉⲣ ⋍ ⲓⲣⲓ ⇔ voir faire < 𓃀 𓂋 𓂂 𓂂 бер ⲃⲁⲗ > ver- be- be

𓆑 ver worm boːɽ, boːɖ
